attributes.action: ensure that straight questions recieve a straight answer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any MP should be capable of answering a straight question with a straight answer. Straight answers do not include duplicitous statements nor do they include a diatribe on the oppositions stance. Instances such as PM's question time, the MPs who appear on Newsnight (for example), show that MPs are more concerned with making themsleves look good than serving the people who elected them. ANSWER THE QUESTIONS!
